name: Mouse in the House
blurb: A comically entertaining game that combines the puzzle and strategy genres to create a unique experience on the iOS.

rewards.reward: - Donate a dollar as we need all the help we can get. We will be extremely grateful.
***PACKAGE 1*** A "Thank You" e-card from the development team.
***PACKAGE 2***  Package 1 and a special thanks dedicated to you in the credits of the game!
***PACKAGE 3***  Package 2 and a digital wallpaper illustrated with artwork from "Mouse in the House".
***PACKAGE 4***  Package 3 and a digital copy of all audio found in "Mouse in the House".

- Package 4 and a promo code for downloading "Mouse in the House" free when it goes live.\r\n\r\nMouse in the House will be compatible with retina display iOS devices only and will work with iOS version 5.0 and up.
***PACKAGE 5***  Package 4 and a digital copy of all artwork found in "Mouse in the House" in PDF format, which includes sketches, concept art, graphic design, and everything art for this project!

- Package 5 and a limited edition magnet with "Mouse in the House" artwork on it. If you see other "Mouse in the House" artwork you prefer to be on this item, let us know and will make it happen! We will contact backer for specific reward preferences after the project has been successfully funded.

- Package 5 and a limited edition poster illustrated with "Mouse in the House" artwork signed by the development team. If you see other "Mouse in the House" artwork you prefer to be on this item, let us know and will make it happen! We will contact backer for specific reward preferences after the project has been successfully funded.
